The large bat swooped down and gently set Kup down at the entrance of 
the base. She landed and transformed ito bot mode. She stood at 12 
feet, had a bat wingspan of 30 feet and her bot mode was that of a 
matt black finish. "My name is Battera. I am at your service." She 
bowed to him and folded her wings around her like a cloak. "I am a 
maximal. What faction should you belong to?"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Kup : :
> Kup had to fight to speak, the gas almost taking full effect.
> Kup: That building below us is my base. Near the entrance would do. 
I'm Kup, what's your name, lass?
>  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:A shape, a large shadow was 
flying high over head when she saw light 
> flashing on the ground below. She decided to fly down for a closer 
> look.  She swooped down and landed in a nearby tree. She hung 
upside 
> down and looked at the bot who seemed to be fighting with another 
> bot.  She saw the one bot run through a cloud and start to faulter. 
> she sighed. "Well, I don't know who this bot is, but for my 
> programming, I must help."  She released the branch she was hanging 
> by and gracefully opened up her leathery wings. She swooped down 
and 
> grabbed the bot (KUP) by the shoulders and started to take to the 
> sky. "Relax, your safe now. I won't hurt you. So I would greatly 
> appreciate it if you wouldn't try to hurt me." She used her huge 
> wings to gain lift and rose over the trees. "Any place you want to 
be 
> dropped off at?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Kup : :
> > The Autobot drill seargent didn't have time to react. He ran into 
> the gas and out the other side of the cloud.
> > Kup continued the chase but he could feel the effects start. His 
> body was growing numb, paralizing.
> > Trying anything he could, Kup fired over Flicker, at the ceiling 
in 
> front of him. This brings down a barrier of ruble in front of 
Flicker.
> 
>
